groups.name: embedded.localstack
groups.description: Configuration properties related to embedded Localstack.

values.description: Enables configuration of Localstack server on startup.
Disables configuration of Localstack server on startup.
Default Localstack image in version 0.10.8. Ref https://hub.docker.com/r/localstack/localstack for further info.
Includes API_GATEWAY service into Localstack on startup.
Includes KINESIS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes DYNAMODB service into Localstack on startup.
Includes DYNAMODB_STREAMS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes S3 service into Localstack on startup.
Includes FIREHOSE service into Localstack on startup.
Includes LAMBDA service into Localstack on startup.
Includes SNS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes SQS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes REDSHIFT service into Localstack on startup.
Includes SES service into Localstack on startup.
Includes ROUTE53 service into Localstack on startup.
Includes CLOUDFORMATION service into Localstack on startup.
Includes CLOUDWATCH service into Localstack on startup.
Includes SSM service into Localstack on startup.
Includes SECRETSMANAGER service into Localstack on startup.
Includes STEPFUNCTIONS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes CLOUDWATCHLOGS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes STS service into Localstack on startup.
Includes IAM service into Localstack on startup.
